room_title: Escape room "The Lost Book of Spells" by Team vs Time in Hartford
room_description: You may have finally found it - the haven of Rosalind LeFay, a powerful witch, who is said to have in her possession the best-kept secret in magical history, the Lost Book of Spells. You have been on the trail of the mysterious spell book for almost a decade and it all comes down to thisâ€¦ Now can you find the Book and get away before she returns?
